name: SoundByLocation
description:
AR is a medium that is dominated by visuals, but those visuals limit the interactive element and fun that Nianctic's mission is striving for! We want players to stop looking at their phones, and startpercieving the world in a new way - a sonic way! We've created the ability for users to leave audio messages for others to find without any visual cue, encouraging users to explore and discover. Make puzzles! Share the secret history of a place! Tell your story to the world!

Quick Easy instructions:

1)Download the app & localize to the waypoint

2) Add sound to the scene, they should be represented as little gift boxes. Wander a bit! Have fun with it!

3) Save your sound presents when you are done & close the app.

4) Open the app, localize, and load the assets. They will now be invisible and can only be sonically located.

5)Hand to your friend to find your sounds!
